attributes.action: Acknowledge the role played by the Chancellor in the collapse of Kaupthing Singer and Freidlander (IOM)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
British citizens lives have been destroyed by the actions of the PM's chancellor.  In many cases the damage has already been done and any resolution will be too late.

If the British Government do nothing to help, as has been shown to be the case, then at least some sort of acknowledgement of the disaster is needed.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
